title: Aaron Judge Judgement
description:
Hembo and Buster dive deep on Aaron Judge’s arbitration hearing and play a game of “Reminds Me Of…”. Then, Karl Ravech stops by to discuss the College World Series final between Ole Miss and Oklahoma, Freddie Freeman’s return to Atlanta, the Yankees’ magic formula, Judge’s walk off hit against the Astros, and if Yordan Álvarez will participate in the Home Run Derby. Later, Buster’s conversation with Adam Wainwright on the intricacies of his curveball grip, working on his command, learning pitching from his brother, strike percentage, what’s next for him and if he’s thinking about the Hall of Fame.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Hembo and Buster dive deep on Aaron Judge’s arbitration hearing; Karl Ravech on Freddie Freeman’s return to Atlanta; and Buster's conversation with Adam Wainwright
